concept.title: Modify 3D Solids
concept.shortdesc: You can edit three-dimensional solids in several unique ways, includingchamfer, fillet, section, and slice. You can also modify individual faces and edges of solids, as well as imprint, separate, shell, and check solids. You can edit three-dimensional ACIS solids, including boxes, cones, cylinders, dishes, domes,
